typeSystemDescription.name: Dependency Parse Linguistic Type
typeSystemDescription.description:
This is the linguistic type of dependency parse, which extends the UIMA Annotation type. As a result, it contains the features of Begin and End. It is used for annotating sentences with their dependency structure.
Dependency: Linguistic_type: Token

typeDescription.name: com.ctapweb.feature.type.DependencyParse
typeDescription.description: the dependency parse of a sentence
